name: 阿芒迪娜·梅耶尔
awards: 2022年 第72届柏林国际电影节 主竞赛单元 最佳短片 (提名) 两个小号的故事
name_full: 阿芒迪娜·梅耶尔 Amandine Meyer
introduction: The designer, artist and animator was born in Lorraine, France. After spending some years in Berlin, she now lives in Montreuil, near Paris. Her books, which include several for children, have been both self-published and taken on by various publishing houses. She also collaborates with other artists on video and light projects. Her first comic books were published in the Japanese fanzine “UZO”. Histoire pour 2 trompettes is her debut film as an animation director.
